940640.name: Astronaut: The Moon Eclipse
940640.description:
Astronaut: Moon Eclipse - is a "tower defense" in the space.

Throughout the game, you have to protect the earth of the unearthly objects flying around â˜„ï¸

While you will be on a static spaceship.

With the help of rockets you will have to split them into pieces. ğŸš€

while you must take into account the gravity of the planets that will pull the rocket, thereby changing the course


By end of the way, you'll find yourself at darkness. And you have to find out where is comets are coming.

Use flashlight to see some of them but conserve the battery.
* * *
Made in Uzbekistan
